snippet: GARTNER--David, died March 30, 2016 at the age of 96 years. Beloved husband of the late Bernice (Bunny) Gartner, father of Diane and June, brother of the late Moe and Melvin, "Poppa" to Aaron, Sari and Dori, uncle of Marilyn, Ilene, Sharon, Susan, David, Fred, Bobby and Ronald, and friend to all. Graveside service will be held Sunday, April 3 at 11am, Mt. Eden Cemetery, Hawthorne, NY. Donations in his memory may be made to the Jewish Federation of South Palm Beach County. 1/3
lead_paragraph: GARTNER--David, died March 30, 2016 at the age of 96 years. Beloved husband of the late Bernice (Bunny) Gartner, father of Diane and June, brother of the late Moe and Melvin, "Poppa" to Aaron, Sari and Dori, uncle of Marilyn, Ilene, Sharon, Susan, David, Fred, Bobby and Ronald, and friend to all. Graveside service will be held Sunday, April 3 at 11am, Mt. Eden Cemetery, Hawthorne, NY. Donations in his memory may be made to the Jewish Federation of South Palm Beach County. 1/3
